name: TCS
process: TCS conducts an online placement test (TCS NQT) divided into Foundation (quantitative, logical, verbal) and Advanced sections (including coding for certain roles), followed by technical interview rounds and a final HR interview.
codingTopics: Find Missing Number in an Array

name: Infosys
process: Infosys conducts an online test (covering quantitative aptitude, logical reasoning, and verbal ability), followed by a technical interview and an HR interview.
